name: numeric_family, second argument, invalid short value -6

body.query: from numeric_family | eval long1 = to_long("101", _short) | keep long1

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.4.0-c62f5aed6fecdbe40db8df7fdb1c1ade91ed1715 "No limit defined, adding default limit of [1000]", 299 Elasticsearch-9.4.0-c62f5aed6fecdbe40db8df7fdb1c1ade91ed1715 "Line 1:36: evaluation of [to_long(\"101\", _short)] failed, treating result as null. Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-9.4.0-c62f5aed6fecdbe40db8df7fdb1c1ade91ed1715 "Line 1:36: org.elasticsearch.xpack.esql.core.InvalidArgumentException: Unable to convert [101] to number of base [-6]"
